rooms.description: A welcoming space with Bohemian decor and storage built-in for shoe racks.

An open-plan space combining living room and dining area with Bohemian art installations, comfortable seating, and natural light. Walls featuring textured finishes and vibrant textiles complement the style.

A functional yet stylish kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring exposed brick backsplash and vintage elements that adhere to local building norms. Vastu-aligned placement with east-facing windows for energy flow.

A dedicated workspace optimized for natural light from the north side and designed in a Bohemian style with minimalist yet artistic elements. Vastu principles suggest placing it in the southwest corner of the penthouse.

The primary sleeping area featuring abundant natural light from an east-facing window and decor that includes Bohemian textiles and artisanal fixtures. The bed is oriented along the north-south axis per Vastu principles.
